sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import {Container, Row,Col,Form,ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg'; const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() // This is an Static Data later we will call our API and load our data from database const tour =tourData.find(tour=> tour.id===id) // destructure props from tour object const {photo,title ,desc, price, address, reviews,city,distance, maxGroupSize} = tour; const {totalRating,avgRating} = calculateAvgRating (reviews); // format Rating const options = { day:"numeric", month:"long" , year:"numeric" }; return <>
'

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? 'Not Rated' : ({reviews?.length}) } {address}
{city} ${price}/per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* ============= Tour Reviews Section ============ */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
Elias

{ new Date ("12-07-2024").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
)) }
{/* ============= Tour Reviews Section End ============ */}
} export default TourDetails
